## Hooking up original hardware

Gather an Atari 2600 (henceforth "Atari"), an Atari 2600 game cartridge (henceforth "cart"), a VCR, an RCA to F adapter (henceforth "adapter"), and component cables.

Set channel switch on Atari to 2
Attach F end of adapter to VCR, then plug Atari RCA cable into it.
Link the VCR and TV with the component cables.
Turn on TV and set to Channel 2.
Turn on VCR and set to Channel 2.
Put the cart in the Atari and power it on.

Enjoy video game.
